    index="test",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "comments": {
                "type": "nested"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="test",
    id="1",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "title": "Test title",
        "comments": [
            {
                "author": "kimchy",
                "text": "comment text"
            },

            }
        ]
    },
)

resp2 = client.search(
    index="test",
    query={
        "nested": {
            "path": "comments",
            "query": {
                "match": {
                    "comments.text": "words"
                }
            },
            "inner_hits": {
                "_source": False,
                "docvalue_fields": [
                    "comments.text.keyword"
                ]
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp2)
